title: Merchants
content:
can also gift items and gold to the merchant, without asking their items or gold in return. The increase in attitude you get with the trade depends on the gold value the merchant "profited" and the character's level. The higher the character's level, the more gold you need to give to shift their attitude. At 1st level, each 4 gp in the merchan't favor increases their attitude by 1.
